casebody.data:
LAUBACK ET AL. (Co. Drain Comrs.) vs. TOLAND (Supv.) AND O’MEARA (Twp. Clerk), No. 15030.

Certiorari to Kent.

To compel the township clerk to make to the supervisor a certified statement of the amount of the taxes to be assessed, on account of the construction of a drain, and also a statement of the lands assessed for benefits, together with the amount assessed, and to compel the supervisor to present such statements to the board of supervisors at the annual meeting thereof.

The circuit judge granted the writ. Affirmed Nov. 5, 1895. with costs.
